steps.name: chapter_one
steps.text: You in the zoo playground, eating ice cream from a cone.  A melted drop falls to the floor.  You look down and notice a small creature eat it, then skuttle off.

opts.text: Carry on eating the ice cream.

steps.name: more_ice_cream
steps.text: It's delicious, and you even find a big blob of chocolate at the bottom of the cone.

steps.name: follow
steps.text: The creature burrows under some of the play equipment, through the soft wood chippings.  You go closer and notice a small hole.  Brushing aside the wood chip you find a small hatch in the ground.  You decide to...

opts.text: cover it back up so nobody else notices and you can call for reinforcements.
open the hatch to peek inside.
